rule.field: WMImplant| change_user | gen_cli | command_exec | disable_wdigest | disable_winrm | enable_wdigest | enable_winrm | registry_mod | remote_posh | sched_job | service_mod | process_kill | active_users | basic_info | power_off | vacant_system | logon_events
rule.info: Falsepositives: Administrative scripts that use the same keywords..
